Pressure Sensors: Equip the toothbrush with pressure sensors that alert users if they are brushing too hard, which can lead to enamel damage.
Smart Timer: Incorporate a built-in timer that automatically turns off after two minutes of brushing, ensuring users meet the recommended brushing duration.
Debris Removal: Add a small, disposable debris collector at the base of the toothbrush that can be easily cleaned and reused.
UV Sterilization: Include a UV sterilization feature that can sanitize the toothbrush head after each use, reducing the buildup of bacteria.
Charging Station: Develop a charging station that not only recharges the toothbrush battery but also dries the bristles, preventing the growth of bacteria.
